author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie You will receive tomorrow copies of ‘The Holy Office’. Go to the ‘Homestead’. Get ‘Hallow Eve’ or the money for it. Tell Norman I am publishing ‘Eveline’ and ‘The Sisters’ and ask him to write for you permission for me to reprint them. I have written to John Lane: he has answered asking me to send on my verses for consideration. Keep these sheets of The Holy Office till you get directions from me in a day or two. I am expecting a letter from you. I send my verses to Lane on Wednesday. Jim
